Attacks.Name: Hurricane
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target gains the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Aerial Ace
Attacks.Effect: This attack cannot be blocked or modified by defense rolls.

Attacks.Name: Air Slash
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character gains the Daze special condition.

Attacks.Name: Brave Bird
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character suffers 2 damage.

Superpowers.Name: No Guard
Superpowers.Effect: This character may reroll any attack dice and cannot be forced to reroll any defense dice.

Superpowers.Name: Tailwind
Superpowers.Effect: All allied characters within Range 3 of this character increase their movement to L until the end of their next activation.

Superpowers.Name: Feather Dance
Superpowers.Effect: Choose an enemy character within Range 2. That character subtracts 1 die from all attack rolls until the end of its next activation.

Attacks.Name: Feather Storm
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, the target character gains the Slow special condition.

Superpowers.Name: No Guard
Superpowers.Effect: This character may reroll any attack dice and cannot be forced to reroll any defense dice.
